Description: You as landlord at a property in Stirling have failed to ensure that any relevant gas fitting and any flue serving those gas fittings are maintained in a safe condition in that you have not had each appliance and flue checked for safety within 12 months of installation and at intervals of not more than 12 months thereafter and you have failed to keep a record of those checks for a period of at least 2 years from the date of that check. As a result of those failures the flue of your gas boiler was found to be disconnected within the loft space on the 21st of September 2021 creating a risk of exposure to products of combustion including Carbon Monoxide.
